name: Surfied
tagline: Surfied is the Serious Game that provides surf clubs with a more interactive and efficient way to collect and verify membership information and keep members actively engaged with events, news, media, like-minded people, and the exploration of ocean coasts.
body: Please download the source code from [GitHub](https://github.com/socialray/Surfied). And visit [Surfied](http://surfclubatuhm.surfied.com/) to login and play the Serious Game designed for Surf Clubs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
